thread.title: Mevr. nok de Groot
thread.title_full: BoMonT, Original Brands & Lifestyle Trends Beoordeeld door Mevr. nok de Groot

author: Mevr. nok de Groot
title: Mevr. nok de Groot
text:
Your price is o.k but because we know you and we can trust that you will take responsability if something went wrong. It was the last 2 orders from that both of them went wrong. One was lacking of quality control. The sleeve was closed with sewing thred. The other was used (second hand, already once washed) product.
As I Sa√Ød, I know that your shops exited and we bought your items quite often so we like Bomont. But please take care that you will give your on line customers. We got no chance to pick up the right one so we do hope you will do for us!.
